survey_name: AI-Powered Personalized Learning Platforms in Higher Education Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from university students and educators on the adoption, effectiveness, and satisfaction with AI-powered personalized learning platforms in higher education settings.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with AI-powered personalized learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for familiarity assessment. Ensure options are balanced and cover the full spectrum of familiarity.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with AI-powered personalized learning platforms?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered personalized learning platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Slightly familiar' or higher in Q1
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field for unspecified platforms.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered personalized learning platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Slightly familiar' or higher in Q1

questions.question_text: What are the primary benefits you have experienced from using AI-powered personalized learning platforms?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one platform in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to capture various benefits and include an 'Other' option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What are the primary benefits you have experienced from using AI-powered personalized learning platforms?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one platform in Q2

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered personalized learning platforms you have used?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one platform in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction assessment. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered personalized learning platforms you have used?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one platform in Q2

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using AI-powered personalized learning platforms?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one platform in Q2
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback on challenges. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using AI-powered personalized learning platforms?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one platform in Q2

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend AI-powered personalized learning platforms to other students or educators?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one platform in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for likelihood assessment. This helps gauge advocacy and perceived value.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend AI-powered personalized learning platforms to other students or educators?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one platform in Q2
